text: Zisas vov, Oriv mbɨkshɨman ndav perav kim, ana phorga rui gumgi, mbe nduarira ana han zav, kha nzambarar ana muuŋgi, “Ndu khar nza suaŋ, maaŋgi tugar mba bigi nzan hɨrie? Ram mbui khesharigi bigeŋ fharav nzan hɨgɨrim, nza gangip, kaŋgip, khaŋ suanga, ndu taagi nuianan zirɨ za mbui, kha nuian vhɨzɨrga?”
